title: API Copy Logic Schema
description: Schema for the api_copy logic type in Corezoid processes

type.description: Specifies this is a Copy Task logic block

user_id.description: Internal user ID associated with the operation

oneOf.description: Numeric ID of the target Process
String ID of the target Process, must start with '@'

conv_id.description: ID of the target Process to receive the copied task or where the task to modify resides. Can be either a numeric ID or a string starting with '@'

convTitle.description: Title of the target Process to call

ref.description: Reference ID for the task. Can be a static value or a dynamic reference like {{root.task_id}}

mode.description: Mode for creating a new task or modifying an existing one

is_sync.description: Whether to wait for the operation to complete before proceeding (synchronous operation)

group.description: Specifies how to handle multiple copies. Must be 'all' when using key/value data in the data parameter. Must be empty string ('') when using empty object data.

data.description: Key-value pairs to include in the copied task or to update in the target task

additionalProperties.description: Value for the parameter, can include dynamic references like {{user.name}}

data_type.description: Specifies the data types of the copied or updated values

additionalProperties.description: Data type for the corresponding parameter in the data object

send_parent_data.description: Whether to include the current task's data in the copy (only applicable for mode='create')

err_node_id.description: ID of the node for error handling

obj_to_id.description: Not typically used for standard copy operations
